article_title: Russian Hard-Line Stance on Ukraine Prompts US to Reconsider Policy
article_text:
WASHINGTON—Nearly a year after Russia began its military campaign in Ukraine, the U.S. and its European allies find themselves in a familiar predicament: struggling to devise a strategy to get Moscow to back off.

While Western economic sanctions, combined with a steep drop in the price of oil, have inflicted heavy damage on the Russian economy, they’ve done nothing to temper the Kremlin’s support for eastern Ukraine’s separatist...

twitter.description: As Secretary of State Kerry travels to Kiev this week, policy makers in Washington are re-examining their decision not to supply weapons to Ukraine.
twitter.title: Russian Hard-Line Stance on Ukraine Prompts U.S. to Reconsider Policy
